thread.section_title: Timhotel Palais Royal Louvre - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: acceptable in a pinch
thread.title_full: acceptable in a pinch - Review of Timhotel Palais Royal Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: raku
title: acceptable in a pinch
text:
The room was clean and the breakfast was good. The rooms are small, but there are different levels of smallness. I started in a tiny room and was moved to a bigger room. All rooms have paper thin walls, though my first room was louder than the second. Also nothing worked properly in my first room - lights, door lock...
The service is not great. They moved me to a new room because they had to renovate my first room, but did not explain that to me the night before. Since it was a business trip and I had a morning meeting, it was a real hassle.
If you get a good deal, this place will be fine, but I would not stay here by choice.
Room Tip: if your room seems small, ask for a bigger room See more room tips
